long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An official extension from Playkot to allow using Flash once and for all.

You donâ€™t have to deal with Flash permission settings each time you launch Tropic Storm. All Flash games will launch automatically, no squabble!
